jobDescription: Develop responsive web interfaces using React. Collaborate with UI/UX team.
qualifications: Strong knowledge of React and JavaScript. Familiarity with HTML, CSS, and REST APIs. Good problem-solving skills.

jobDescription: Build and maintain server-side applications. Integrate databases and third-party APIs.
qualifications: Proficient in Node.js and Express. Experience with MongoDB or PostgreSQL. Understanding of authentication and security.

jobDescription: Manage social media campaigns. Monitor marketing performance metrics.
qualifications: Good understanding of SEO and SEM. Experience with Google Analytics and Meta Ads. Excellent communication skills.

jobDescription: Analyze business data and generate reports. Collaborate with business teams for data insights.
qualifications: Strong Excel and SQL skills. Knowledge of Power BI or Tableau. Attention to detail and logical thinking.

jobDescription: Design user-centric interfaces. Conduct user research and testing.
qualifications: Experience with Figma or Adobe XD. Knowledge of usability principles. Creativity and collaboration skills.

jobDescription: Write SEO-friendly articles and blog posts. Proofread and edit content before publishing.
qualifications: Excellent written English. Understanding of SEO basics. Ability to meet deadlines.

jobDescription: Coordinate recruitment and onboarding. Maintain HR records and assist with payroll.
qualifications: Degree in Human Resources or related field. Good communication and organizational skills. Basic knowledge of labor laws.

jobDescription: Respond to customer queries via chat and email. Provide product guidance and issue resolution.
qualifications: Excellent communication skills. Patience and problem-solving abilities. Familiarity with CRM tools.

jobDescription: Test applications for bugs and usability issues. Write test cases and maintain documentation.
qualifications: Knowledge of manual and automated testing. Familiarity with tools like Selenium or JIRA. Analytical thinking.

jobDescription: Create graphics for social media and marketing. Collaborate with content and brand teams.
qualifications: Proficiency in Photoshop, Illustrator, or Canva. Eye for design and branding. Ability to handle multiple projects.
